mapper.insert:
insert into china_day_add(localConfirmadd, deadRate, healRate, date, dead, heal, infect, localinfectionadd, confirm, suspect, importedCase, y) values
( #{item.localConfirmadd}, #{item.deadRate}, #{item.healRate}, #{item.date}, #{item.dead}, #{item.heal}, #{item.infect}, #{item.localinfectionadd}, #{item.confirm}, #{item.suspect}, #{item.importedCase}, #{item.y} )

insert into china_day( nowConfirm, y, confirm, deadRate, date, localConfirm, localConfirmH5, nowSevere, noInfect, suspect, heal, importedCase, healRate, noInfectH5, localAccConfirm, dead ) values
( #{item.nowConfirm}, #{item.y}, #{item.confirm}, #{item.deadRate}, #{item.date}, #{item.localConfirm}, #{item.localConfirmH5}, #{item.nowSevere}, #{item.noInfect}, #{item.suspect}, #{item.heal}, #{item.importedCase}, #{item.healRate}, #{item.noInfectH5}, #{item.localAccConfirm}, #{item.dead} )

insert into foreign_country( name, continent, y, date, isUpdated, confirmAdd, confirmAddCut, confirm, suspect, dead, heal, nowConfirm, confirmCompare, nowConfirmCompare, healCompare, deadCompare) values
( #{item.name}, #{item.continent}, #{item.y}, #{item.date}, #{item.isUpdated}, #{item.confirm}, #{item.confirmAddCut}, #{item.confirm}, #{item.suspect}, #{item.dead}, #{item.heal}, #{item.nowConfirm}, #{item.confirmCompare}, #{item.nowConfirmCompare}, #{item.healCompare}, #{item.deadCompare} )

insert into foreign_province( name, date, nameMap, isUpdated, confirmAdd, confirmAddCut, confirm, suspect, dead, heal, country ) values
( #{item.name}, #{item.date}, #{item.nameMap}, #{item.isUpdated}, #{item.confirmAdd}, #{item.confirmAddCut}, #{item.confirm}, #{item.suspect}, #{item.dead}, #{item.heal}, #{item.country} )

insert into wom_aboard( continent, name, confirm, confirmAdd, dead, deadCompare, heal, healCompare, pubDate, y, date, nowConfirm, nowConfirmCompare, confirmAddCut, suspect, confirmCompare ) values
( #{item.continent}, #{item.name}, #{item.confirm}, #{item.confirmAdd}, #{item.dead}, #{item.deadCompare}, #{item.heal}, #{item.healCompare}, #{item.pubDate}, #{item.y}, #{item.date}, #{item.nowConfirm}, #{item.nowConfirmCompare}, #{item.confirmAddCut}, #{item.suspect}, #{item.confirmCompare} )

insert into wom_world( pubDate, y, date, nowConfirm , nowConfirmAdd, confirm, confirmAdd, heal, healAdd, dead, deadAdd, deathrate, curerate, lastUpdateTime ) values
( #{item.pubDate}, #{item.y}, #{item.date}, #{item.nowConfirm}, #{item.nowConfirmAdd}, #{item.confirm}, #{item.confirmAdd}, #{item.heal}, #{item.healAdd}, #{item.dead}, #{item.deadAdd}, #{item.deathrate}, #{item.curerate}, #{item.lastUpdateTime} )

insert into covid19_deaths( dataAsOf, startDate, endDate, `group`, state, sex, ageGroup, covid19Deaths, totalDeaths, pneumoniaDeaths, pneumoniaAndCovid19Deaths, influenzaDeaths, pneumoniaInfluenzaOrCovid) values
( #{item.dataAsOf}, #{item.startDate}, #{item.endDate}, #{item.group}, #{item.state}, #{item.sex}, #{item.ageGroup}, #{item.covid19Deaths}, #{item.totalDeaths}, #{item.totalDeaths}, #{item.pneumoniaAndCovid19Deaths}, #{item.influenzaDeaths}, #{item.pneumoniaInfluenzaOrCovid} )
